You need a powerful VPS hosted on quality hardware and network?  
Take a look at our exclusive package for LowEndTalk community!

<hr>

**OVZ-LET-Oct2016**

* 1 CPU Core
* 512 MB RAM // 512MB Swap
* 50 GB Storage
* 1 TB @ 1Gbps
* 1 Dedicated IPv4 and IPv6 subnet
* SLA of 99.95%
* <b>$2.50/month</b>
* <b>$15.00/semi-annually</b>
* <b>$28.00/year</b>
* Order link: http://gdbi.pw/letoct2016


_N.B: Quantity and location availability may vary depending resources available._

<hr> 

<pre>
Our OpenVZ VPS are available in the following locations:

Montreal, Quebec, Canada
New Jersey, Piscataway, USA
Miami, Florida, USA
Atlanta, Georgia, USA
Los Angeles, California, USA
Amsterdam, The Netherlands, Europe
London, United Kingdon, Europe

<hr> 

Did you know that we also offer KVM VPS, LowEndSprit NAT VPS, IP Leasing, Marketing services and much more? Visit our website or contact us directly for more information.

<hr> 

* All our VPS support TUN/TAP/PPP
* We accept TOR Relay on our Dedicated IPv4 VPS. Read AuP for more information
* We accept Paypal, Stripe, Bitcoin (via Bitpay) and 2Checkout.
* Looking Glass: https://www.deepnetsolutions.com/faq.html
* We speak French and English. You can reach us 24/7, via the following link: http://gdbi.pw/contact

Regards, David.
